title: No gold team icon????
body: so i finally got enough of the championship jewels to do the first upgrade on my tsm icon and i forged it and i still do not have the gold tsm worlds icon. Is there like something else i need to do or something?

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you may have accidentally disenchanted your Tier 2 Icon. Write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if there's something we can do.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
what do i have to do to write one out

Click on the link below and fill out the required fields. You can choose any category, but the first will probably work best.

[**CLICK HERE**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
i have done so thank you
